Trade/Device Name(s): BD BACTEC Lytic/10 Anaerobic/F Blood Culture Medium (plastic)
Specimen Container(s): BD BACTEC Lytic/10 Anaerobic/F culture vial (plastic)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Incubation in prereduced enriched Soybean Casein Digest broth
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD BACTEC Lytic/10 Anaerobic/F (plastic) blood culture medium used for anaerobic microorganism detection in blood via BACTEC fluorescent instruments
Indications for Use Summary: For anaerobic blood cultures; principal use is with BACTEC fluorescent series instruments for the qualitative culture and recovery of anaerobic microorganisms from blood
